Metadata.title: Blue Mind Magazine
Metadata.description: Surf Science: Where surf and science meet. From surfers, to surfers.

newsletter.title: Stay in the Loop
newsletter.description: Where surf & science meet, delivered to your inbox.

hero.title: BLUE MIND
hero.subtitle: Surf Science Magazine
hero.description: Where surf and science meet. Exploring the intersection of ocean sports, human health, and scientific research.

newsletter.title: Don't Miss an Issue
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest in surf science, exclusive content, and early access to new issues.

about.label: Our Story
about.title: About Blue Mind
about.description: Blue Mind Magazine bridges the gap between scientific research and the surfing community. We make complex studies accessible while celebrating the transformative power of the sea.

quote.text: Surfing has always been more than a sport. It's a way of understanding ourselves through the rhythm of the ocean.

Issues.title: Issues
Issues.subtitle: The Archive
Issues.description: Explore our collection of issues where surf and science meet.
Issues.exploreMore: Want to explore more? Check out our previous issues and discover the full archive of surf science content.

magazine.title: About Blue Mind
magazine.description: Blue Mind Magazine is where surf and science meet. We explore the fascinating intersection of ocean sports, human health, and scientific research.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To bridge the gap between scientific research and the surfing community, making complex studies accessible and actionable.

editor.title: Chief Editor
editor.name: Pedro Seixas
editor.bio: Pedro Seixas holds a PhD in Human Kinetics and serves as the Scientific Coordinator at Surfing Medicine International (SMI). As a physiotherapist and passionate surfer, he founded Blue Mind Magazine to create a platform that unites his two greatest passions: science and surfing.

publisher.title: Publisher
publisher.name: Surfisio
publisher.description: Surfisio is a specialized physiotherapy and sports performance company dedicated to the surfing community. Founded in 2011 with the philosophy "We Drop The Pain!"

smi.name: Surfing Medicine International
smi.description: SMI is a non-profit organization founded by medical doctors and surfers dedicated to the science of surfing medicine.

collaboration.title: Collaborate With Us
collaboration.description: Are you a researcher, scientist, or surf enthusiast with a story to tell? We're always looking for contributors who share our passion for surf science.

vision.description: Our vision is to create a global community where surf and science come together to improve lives and deepen our understanding of the ocean's impact on human health.

Contact.title: Get in Touch
Contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you
Contact.description: Whether you have a question about our magazine, want to contribute an article, or are interested in partnership opportunities, we're here to help.

hero.label: Let's Talk
hero.tagline: We love hearing from our readers. Whether you have a question, feedback, or just want to say hi, drop us a message.

social.description: Join the conversation on social media

contribute.title: Contribute
contribute.description: Got a story about surf science? We're always looking for contributors.
contribute.guidelines: We welcome articles about surf science, health research, and stories from the community.

form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject
form.success: Thank you! Your message has been sent.
form.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

notSure.description: Take a look at what we've published so far. Our archive is always free to browse.
